post.text: Wow! Thank you Louisiana - l love you, and I am with you! Thoughts and prayers are with you, everyday. -DJT

comment.author: Kaylyn
comment.text: Regardless of who becomes President I wanna see a presidential candidate that has worked his whole life helping people not just when votes are on the line I want to see someone who is selfless, someone who dedicates his life to helping people in need long before he becomes President elect. Thats when I will vote.

replies.author: Rachael
replies.text: there was a man who helped Trump with a flat tire. Trump asked the guy how he could thank him. Guy asked Trump to send his wife some flowers. Trump trumped that and included a note with the flowers telling the guy his mortgage is paid in full. was that a photo opp too? he wasnt even running for POTUS then.
